page.title: 04BURWELL HOUSE.
page.content: The House is big{Local Education {Authority centre}for all sorts of courses. These are often{for the {public}but many{school parties}stay there{too.}They are usually about a week long but some last for a fortnight.People on school courses usually have a video to watch.Bed-time for the children is around 10pm and upstairs there are the{sleeping {facilities}(bunk-beds).Food is cooked and served down stairs.There is a {video studio,}a bar and a tuck-shop. It is run by{a Warden and his deputy. The Warden has a bungalow in the {grounds}which are cared for by a gardener. They are{lovely}with trees and flowers looking really nice. There are also{cooks and a caretaker. { Community lunches}are held regularly to keep people informed about what is going on in the village.
